title: PLI should reward EV cell making, not batteries: GTRI
description: Think tank Global Trade Research Initiative (GTRI) suggests that India's production linked incentive (PLI) scheme should focus on making electric vehicle (EV) cells rather than batteries. GTRI highlights the need for battery recycling infrastructure and clean energy sources to power EV charging stations, while emphasizing long-term sustainability over short-term gains.
